name: Dodrio

abilities.name: Retreat Aid
abilities.text: As long as Dodrio is Benched, pay 1 Colorless less to retreat your Active Pok√©mon.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dodrio.

flavorText: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

strengths: Retreat Aid reduces retreat cost for Active Pokemon
Stacks with multiple Dodrio on bench
weaknesses: Rage requires taking damage to be effective
synergies: Heavy retreat cost Pokemon benefit from Retreat Aid
Multiple Dodrio stack (2 Dodrio = 2 less retreat cost)
counters: Gust of Wind - force Dodrio active

competitiveHistory: Dodrio from Jungle was a competitively significant support Pokemon due to its Retreat Aid Pokemon Power. Having one or two Dodrio on the bench could reduce or eliminate retreat costs for high-retreat Pokemon like Chansey and Snorlax. This made it a staple in stall and control decks that relied on heavy Pokemon. The free retreat cost on Dodrio itself made it easy to cycle.

rulings.ruling: Multiple Dodrio on the bench stack - two Dodrio reduce retreat cost by 2.
Retreat Aid only works while Dodrio is on the Bench, not when Active.
Retreat Aid cannot reduce retreat cost below 0.
